Ohh..then stick with UOB first ba😂 personally i feel since the $500 saving may not be guranteed then UOB is a better choice.Btw if you switch to ocbc using their cc is not mandatory. Anyway its 0.6% of interest for $500 of spending only. You can get better cashback/rewards rates with other cards out there.
